content:
Quarterly Review Meeting - ACME Corp

Attendees:

  • John Smith (ACME CEO)

  • Maria Garcia (ACME CTO)

  • Sarah Johnson (Account Manager)

Q1 2024 Review:

  1. Financial Performance

    • Revenue: $2.5M (15% above target)

    • New contracts signed: 3

  2. Project Status

    • Cloud migration: 80% complete

    • Security audit: Completed

  3. Next Steps

    • Schedule technical review for May

    • Prepare Q2 roadmap
